title: INLD Haryana unit chief Nafe Singh Rathee shot dead in Jhajjar
comments: Bhai Jhajjar , Bahadurgarh and Gurgaon ka scene bhot kharab hai and no one is scared of the cops anymore .

Jatta da muqabala.

It's property related. Nafe Singh Rathee (INLD) has a property dispute with Jagdish Rathee (BJP) who was killed last year [1]

When your farmland suddenly becomes worth millions of dollars, bullets fly. 

Same thing in Outer Bangalore and Hyderabad as well. 

[1] - https://indianexpress.com/article/cities/chandigarh/jagdish-rathi-suicide-by-consuming-poison-6-book-8378877/
It's always been bad. In fact, it's definetly better now than in the 90s or early 2000s when urban development was new.
Yes.I remember years ago a BJP councillor was killed in his home by gunmen in Dichao Kalan near Najafgarh
Rathee? This name is on fire these days
